0000011001011111 1101000010100100 1 -> sum: 1101011100000100, cout: 0
1101111100000110 1010011011100010 1 -> sum: 1000010111101001, cout: 1
0101000100111111 1110001000000100 1 -> sum: 0011001101000100, cout: 1
0101011101111100 0000010100111101 1 -> sum: 0101110010111010, cout: 0
0001101011111010 1110001100010000 0 -> sum: 1111111000001010, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
